Articles.Content: Just docked a pretty large solar tower to my space station and it has been vibrating pretty violently ever since. The station and tower were not vibrating at all before docking. Any ideas? Help?
What did you dock it with?
Did you try turning off SAS? If you have multiple guidance components, on different axis, sometimes they work against each other.
Just undocked and terminated the solar panel module. Didn't know what else to do. Think this might be the kraken bug. I will try again with a different solar panel design.
